mapper.sql: act_id, act_name, act_descr, act_start, act_end, act_score, act_tea_no
mapper.insert:
insert into activity
act_name,
act_descr,
act_start,
act_end,
act_score,
act_tea_no,
#{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actStart,jdbcType=DATE},
#{actEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
#{actScore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{actTeaNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update activity
act_name = #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act_descr = #{actDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act_start = #{actStart,jdbcType=DATE},
act_end = #{actEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
act_score = #{actScore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
act_tea_no = #{actTeaNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where act_id = #{actId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set act_name = #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act_descr = #{actDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act_start = #{actStart,jdbcType=DATE}, act_end = #{actEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, act_score = #{actScore,jdbcType=FLOAT}, act_tea_no = #{actTeaNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} where act_id = #{actId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
